title: ZIMBABWE SABLES RUGBY SPONSORSHIP PACKAGES 2025

opportunity.title: THE OPPORTUNITY: 2025 RUGBY AFRICA CUP
opportunity.description: This July in Kampala, Uganda, the Sables have a direct route to the 2027 Rugby World Cup in Australia. Victory in the Rugby Africa Cup secures automatic qualification, marking Zimbabwe's return to rugby's grandest stage.

breakdown.item: Professional training camp facilities and equipment
Travel and accommodation for international competitions

achievements2024: Champions of the 2024 Rugby Africa Cup, demonstrating dominance in regional competition
Perfect record in 2024 with 7 wins from 7 test matches
Head Coach Pieter Benade named Coach of the Tournament at Rugby Africa Cup
Star player Tapiwa Mafura (Emirates Lions) recognized as Player of the Tournament
Developed emerging talent through the High-Performance Program, with multiple players securing international contracts
Enhanced training facilities and medical support infrastructure
Strengthened grassroots development through nationwide rugby initiatives
strategicGoals: Qualify for the 2027 Rugby World Cup through victory at the Rugby Africa Cup
Expand high-performance program to include 30 contracted players
Establish dedicated training center for national team
Strengthen partnerships with international rugby unions
Develop next generation of players through enhanced academy system

packages.name: Platinum Partner
benefits: Primary jersey sponsor position for all 2025 matches including Rugby Africa Cup
Exclusive branding rights at all home games (stadium perimeter, player tunnel, team bench)
VIP hospitality suite for 20 guests at each home game
Exclusive branding on all training kit, equipment and travel gear
Official team transport branding
Player appearances at 6 corporate events
Team merchandise package (40 authentic jerseys)
First right of refusal for 2026 sponsorship
Full access to team camp and Rugby Africa Cup journey content
Dedicated social media series featuring sponsored team content
Preferred Rugby World Cup 2027 qualification activation rights

packages.name: Gold Partner
benefits: Secondary jersey position (front/top back)
Branding on training kit
VIP hospitality for 15 guests at home games
Player appearances at 4 corporate events
Branded content from Rugby Africa Cup campaign
Match day activation rights at home games
Social media integration during home series
Team merchandise package (35 authentic jerseys)
Dedicated sponsor recognition at all press conferences
First right of refusal for 2026-27 Gold partnership (60-day exclusive negotiation window)

packages.name: Gold Lite Partner
benefits: Secondary jersey position (back/bottom back)
Training kit branding (premium position)
VIP hospitality for 12 guests at home games
Player appearances at 3 corporate events
Match day activation rights at 2 home games
Digital content package focusing on home series
Team merchandise package (30 authentic jerseys)
Sponsor recognition at home games and conferences
Social media integration during home series
First right of refusal for 2026-27 Gold Lite partnership (45-day exclusive negotiation window)

packages.name: Silver Partner
benefits: Shorts or sleeve branding position
Match day perimeter advertising at home games
VIP hospitality for 10 guests at home games
Player appearances at 2 corporate events
Social media integration during home series
Team merchandise package (25 authentic jerseys)
Branding on team press conference backdrop
Monthly team update content for sponsor use

packages.name: Bronze Partner
benefits: Training kit branding (select positions)
Match day advertising panel at home games
VIP hospitality for 5 guests at home games
Player appearance at 1 corporate event
Team merchandise package (15 authentic jerseys)
Social media acknowledgement during home series
Access to team photo and content library

note: All packages include dedicated briefing, invitation to team send-off before Rugby Africa Cup, sponsor recognition on Zimbabwe Rugby Union website, and priority ticket access to all home games.
bonusNote: Note: Bespoke 2025 performance bonus structures available for Platinum and Gold partners in event of 2027 Rugby World Cup qualification.
